select distinct
from order_serve os left join base_serve bs on bs.id = os.serve_id left join times_card_serve_type_relevance tcstr on tcstr.serve_type_id = bs.type_id where os.order_id = #{orderId} and tcstr.times_card_id=#{timesCardId} and bs.type_id not in (select bs2.type_id from base_serve bs2,order_serve os2,times_card_serve_relevance tcsr2 where bs2.id = os2.serve_id and os2.order_id = #{orderId} and tcsr2.serve_id = os2.serve_id and tcsr2.times_card_type_id = #{timesCardId})

select distinct
from order_serve os left join times_card_serve_relevance tcsr on tcsr.serve_id = os.serve_id where os.order_id = #{orderId} and tcsr.times_card_type_id = #{timesCardId}

select distinct
from order_serve os left join base_serve bs on bs.id = os.serve_id left join coupon_serve_type_relevance tcstr on tcstr.serve_type_id = bs.type_id where os.order_id = #{orderId} and tcstr.coupon_id = #{couponId} and bs.type_id not in (select bs2.type_id from base_serve bs2,order_serve os2,coupon_serve_relevance tcsr2 where bs2.id = os2.serve_id and os2.order_id = #{orderId} and tcsr2.serve_id = os2.serve_id and tcsr2.coupon_id=#{couponId})

select distinct
from order_serve os left join coupon_serve_relevance tcsr on tcsr.serve_id = os.serve_id where os.order_id = #{orderId} and tcsr.coupon_id = #{couponId}
